de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.level

Class LevelRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.level.LevelRenderer

  • public class LevelRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    LevelRenderer class. Renders a level. Has camera support.
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LevelRenderer(Level thatLevel, java.awt.GraphicsConfiguration graphicsConfiguration, int thatWidth, int thatHeight)
      Creates a new LevelRenderer which renders a custom level with custom width and height.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LevelRenderer

        public LevelRenderer(Level thatLevel,
             java.awt.GraphicsConfiguration graphicsConfiguration,
             int thatWidth,
             int thatHeight)
        Creates a new LevelRenderer which renders a custom level with custom width and height.
        Parameters:
        thatLevel - Level to render
        graphicsConfiguration - Current used Configuration
        thatWidth - Width of the camera
        thatHeight - Height of the camera

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public final void render(java.awt.Graphics thatG,
          float alpha)
        Renders the level on a Graphics object.
        Parameters:
        thatG - Graphics object to draw on
        alpha - 1 if all ticks for the second are done, 0 if none is done, 0.5 if half etc.

      • repaint

        public final void repaint(int x0,
           int y0,
           int w,
           int h)
        Repaints the component.
        Parameters:
        x0 - Left x-coord of the area as tiles
        y0 - Bottom y-coord of the area as tiles
        w - Width of the area as tiles
        h - Height of the area as tiles

      • setCam

        public final void setCam(Camera cam)
        Sets the current used camera, does not follow automaticly.
        Parameters:
        cam - Cameras watching area to render

      • setLevel

        public final void setLevel(Level thatLevel)
        Sets the level to render.
        Parameters:
        thatLevel - Level to set

      • setRenderBehaviors

        public final void setRenderBehaviors(boolean thatRenderBehaviors)
        Sets the rendering behaviors. If true tile data will be rendered, e.g. for debbugin purpose.
        Parameters:
        thatRenderBehaviors - True if tile data should be rendered
